section.title: Labor Variance by Routing Item
section.para: To view labor variances by Routing Item, select the "Labor Variance by Routing Item" option. The following screen will appear:
When viewing labor variances by Routing Item, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the Item Number of the Item whose labor variances by Routing Item you want to view.
Select desired Routing Item listed on the parent Item's Routing.
Select to display labor variances by Routing Item for all Sites.
Specify Site whose labor variances by Routing Item you want to display.
Labor variances by Routing Item generated on or after this date will be displayed.
Labor variances by Routing Item generated on or before this date will be displayed.
Display lists labor variances by Routing Item, using the specified parameters.
